title: Martin Gardner - Individual Books
description:
These are the individual PDFs of the books on the CD offered here:
  <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/Martin-Gardners-Mathematical-Games-Gardner/dp/0883855453/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1226028449&sr=8-1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/Martin-Gardners-Mathematical-Games-Gardner/dp/0883855453/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1226028449&sr=8-1</a>

This contains all of the books from my other Martin Gardner torrent, but this does *NOT* include the search functionality that the ISO torrent has. Other than this, the books are exactly the same, so you only need to download one of the two torrents.

The books contained are:
1. Hexaflexagons and Other Mathematical Diversions 
2. The Second Scientific American Book of Mathematical Puzzles and Diversions 
3. New Mathematical Diversions 
4. The Unexpected Hanging and Other Mathematical Diversions 
5. Martin GardnerÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s 6th Book of Mathematical Diversions from Scientific American 
6. Mathematical Carnival 
7. Mathematical Magic Show 
8. Mathematical Circus 
9. The Magic Numbers of Dr. Matrix 
10. Wheels, Life, and Other Mathematical Amusements 
11. Knotted Doughnuts and Other Mathematical Entertainers 
12. Time Travel and Other Mathematical Bewilderments 
13. Penrose Tiles to Trapdoor Ciphers 
14. Fractal Music, Hypercards, and more Mathematical Recreations from Scientific American 
15. The Last Recreations: Hydras, Eggs, and Other Mathematical Mystifications.

I can only seed at nighttime for my time zone (GMT -5), so please be patient, and please seed for others as well!!
